Product Title: Mountain Falls Advanced Formula Nail Polish Remover Pads with 96% Acetone, for Natural Nails, 10 Count

Store: Mountain Falls
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Pad', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Count'}
Review Text: Very handy and work great.  Took these on vacation recently and it was great to not need to take the bottle and worry about leakage.  Usually one pad will do all your nails but sometimes it takes a couple.  Recommended
Review Title: Great for travel

reference_summary:
Pet Silk Top Knot Gel (4 Ounce) - Pet Hair Gel for Taming Frizzy Hair & Controlling Flyaways – Dog Anti-Static Lotion Cream with Floral Fragrance – Eliminates Static Charges PET SILK {'Brand': 'PET SILK', 'Scent': 'Floral', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Cream,Gel', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 2.56 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '844854', 'UPC': '872429001513', 'Manufacturer': 'Pet Silk'} This stuff is amazing! I didn't even know such a product existed and was excited to try it when I found it. My baby shih tzu has a top knot that's in the awkward stage where most will stay in a band or clip but the lower pieces fall down into her eyes.

I applied a bit of this and all the hair is staying put, LOVE THIS SO MICH! This tub will probably last me awhile but when it's gone I will be back to buy more. Keeps puppy and dog fly-away hairs firmly in their bands ELEVEN EVER Electric Nail Drill, Professional Portable Nail File Drill Grinder Manicure Pedicure Tools for Polishing, Sanding, Removing Gel and Acrylic Nails (silver) … (silver) (ND-02black) ELEVEN EVER {'Brand': 'ELEVEN EVER', 'Material': 'Aluminum', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Maximum Rotational Speed': '30000 RPM', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.17 x 6.22 x 2.91 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '722943850534'} Nice nail kit, very thorough on the selection of accessories. Works great. Lots of accessories N3 No Name Necessary Pore Minimizing Moisturizing Scented Long-Lasting Anti-aging and Hydrating Face Primer Spray – (200ml) No Name Necessary {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Normal', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Specialty': 'Moisturizing, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 1.8 x 1.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} Good primer. It sprays on and feels a little sticky for about thirty seconds but then dries and feels smooth on your face. Makeup goes on great and stays on really well. Wish it had an SPF. Recommended. No SPF but keeps makeup in place great JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog JOYYUM {'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '787414814279', 'Manufacturer': 'JOYYUM'} I have shorter hair and this worked really well for me, I honestly wasn’t expecting that it was going to work in my shorter hair as the Barrel seems large but to the contrary it does a fabulous job. Recommended A real time saver Mountain Falls Advanced Formula Nail Polish Remover Pads with 96% Acetone, for Natural Nails, 10 Count Mountain Falls {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Pad', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Count'} Very handy and work great. Took these on vacation recently and it was great to not need to take the bottle and worry about leakage. Usually one pad will do all your nails but sometimes it takes a couple. Recommended Great for travel
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Pet Care Enthusiast:** Maintains a strong focus on grooming products for pets, particularly for long-haired breeds like shih tzus, consistently seeking solutions to grooming challenges during transitional hair stages.
- **Grooming Challenges:** Values high-performance products that control flyaways and maintain hairstyles, essential in grooming routines, and has expanded interest in personal grooming tools that enhance efficiency.
- **Fragrance Preference:** Enjoys floral scents, favoring pleasant fragrances in both pet care and personal grooming items.
- **Buying Behavior:** Exhibits brand loyalty towards those providing satisfactory experiences, influencing future purchasing decisions. Recent purchases indicate an appreciation for comprehensive grooming tools and effective personal care items, including travel-friendly solutions.
- **Expanded Interests:** Demonstrates a growing engagement in personal grooming, validating a proactive approach to self-care, as highlighted by acquiring innovative products that simplify routines.
- **Values:** Prioritizes cruelty-free and vegan options, reinforcing a commitment to ethical and sustainable products across both pet and personal grooming routines.

The user actively invests in grooming essentials for both themselves and their pets, showcasing a holistic approach to care. Their positive experience with convenient personal grooming products emphasizes the importance of practicality and functionality, guiding future purchases while maintaining a balance between aesthetics and effective grooming practices.
